Reviews.Content: hours vacation spent looking alternative accommodation unfortunately till night stay wait check hotel represented themselves advertised amenities dirty possibly dangerous dingy peeling paintwork particularly clean called kitchenette toaster kettle plates cutlery detergent tea towel capable tea coffee cheapest brands available phone iron hairdryer ironing board exposed electrical wiring electrical switch hole switch meant holes wall arm chair lost padding dirty found unusable tv reception poor select channels bathroom dirty glad thongs wear shower spare toilet rolls toilet cleaning brush called double glazing extended windows noisy bought ear plugs airconditioner provide white noise lift lugged bags double flights stairs offer help redeeming feature bed relatively linen clean paid 130 internet

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Emily A
Reviews.Content: husband stayed boutique hotel couple times recent visit sydney found hotel excellent location easy walk major attractions half hour opera house walk reception staff friendly accomodating warm arrived time spend minutes looking remote air con found wall curtain except comfortable airy overall found excellent choice accommodation recommend stay

Reviews.Title: “Not THAT bad, but not value for money”

Reviews.Content: stayed recently location oxford street thats plus read reviews cancellation policy wouldve cancelled anyway wasnt bad redone entrance section assume laid carpets stairs hallways foyer stunk smoke cigarette burns beds themselves hard sleepable double glazed windows sound street bareable aircon bathroom bit toilet cracked taps onoff handle coming replacing shower running forgivable budget price 200night 4 people isnt value couldve stayed slightly expensive wouldve value money plus parking

Reviews.Title: “Great Fun Location Awesome Staff”
Reviews.Author: Austraveller52
Reviews.Content: time stayed staff geat little organic market coffee block hotel close oxford art factory gigs grog shop pie road munch attacks walk door pubs restaurants awesome shopping short walk st marys cathedral heritage buildings statues museum parks magnificent walk fun times thanx guys

Reviews.Title: “Glimmer of Hope”

Reviews.Content: stayed friends past weekend decided stay night stumbled relatively cheap heart oxford street ive read reviews yes major issues middle renovations absolutely wrong lobby nice clean simplistic modern design staircase leading story smelt urine cigarettes smell dont doubt fixed renovations expecting dump actually surprised walked stayed 105 expect budget hotel surprisingly clean sign cockroaches clean sheets walls bathroom clean etc keen theme theyve gone golden curtains golden framed mirrors theyre aiming boutique budget hotel charm issues staff served asian lady people assume theyre rude cant past language barrier sometimes difficult understand meant hotel bright future apparently dark past hopefully positive review renovations complete
